title: Kiri Te Kanawa at Christmas
brief_description: A magical live performance from the Barbican Hall in London with Dame Kiri Te Kanawa singing her favourite Christmas songs. They include “Let the Bright Seraphim”, “Angels from the Realms of Glory” and “Silver Bells”. Dame Kiri is accompanied by the Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted by Carl Davis, and the Tallis Chamber Choir.
